verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him, When thou lightest <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the Menorahs <S%H5216><s%>, the seven <S%H7651><s%> Menorahs <S%H5216><s%> shall give light <S%H215><s%> <S%H8686><s%> over against <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4136><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so; he lighted <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the Menorahs <S%H5216><s%> thereof over against <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And this work <S%H4639><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> was of beaten <S%H4749><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, unto the shaft <S%H3409><s%> thereof, unto the flowers <S%H6525><s%> thereof, was beaten work <S%H4749><s%>: according unto the pattern <S%H4758><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> had shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and cleanse <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them.

And thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8763><s%> them: Sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> <S%H8685><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of purifying <S%H2403><s%> upon them, and let them shave <S%H8593><s%> <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all their flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and let them wash <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their clothes <S%H899><s%>, and so make themselves clean <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8694><s%>.

Then let them take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> with his meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, even fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and another <S%H8145><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and thou shalt gather <S%H6950><s%> the whole assembly <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8689><s%>:

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>:

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall offer <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> for an offering <S%H8573><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that they may execute <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>: and thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and offer <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them for an offering <S%H8573><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus shalt thou separate <S%H914><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall be mine.

And after <S%H310><s%> that shall the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to do the service <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and thou shalt cleanse <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them, and offer <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them for an offering <S%H8573><s%>.

For they are wholly given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8803><s%> unto me from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; instead of such as open <S%H6363><s%> every womb <S%H7358><s%>, even instead of the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, have I taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them unto me.

For all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> are mine, both man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>: on the day <S%H3117><s%> that I smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> every firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them for myself.
And I have taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> for all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> as a gift <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8803><s%> to Aharon <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: that there be no plague <S%H5063><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> come nigh <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> according unto all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> concerning the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> unto them.

And the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> were purified <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and they washed <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their clothes <S%H899><s%>; and Aharon <S%H175><s%> offered <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them as an offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and Aharon <S%H175><s%> made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for them to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8763><s%> them.

And after <S%H310><s%> that went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> in to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>: as the YY <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> concerning the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> they unto them.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

This is it that belongeth unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>: from twenty <S%H6242><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> they shall go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to wait <S%H6633><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H6635><s%> upon the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>:

And from the age <S%H1121><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they shall cease <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> waiting <S%H6635><s%> upon the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof, and shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no more:

But shall minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with their brethren <S%H251><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%>, and shall do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no service <S%H5656><s%>. Thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> touching their charge <S%H4931><s%>.
